data.text:
@WalesOnline Very interesting how you've presented the hospital data. Note the difference between WO and BBC presenting the same information. Almost impossible to establish the underlying level of covid hospitalisations from your version. 

The ramp up of covid alarm stories is noted also https://t.co/g8RMnbkguC
@WalesOnline This is no longer a pandemic. Can we just move on? Iâ€™ve had 3 Birthdays since this shit started and now feel old af!
